DOC.criteria: Subject male essential hypertension ( high blood pressure ) Subject good general health ( exception hypertension ) Subject nonsmoker Subject history stroke , chronic seizure , major neurological disease Subject functional disability interfere rise seat position stand position Subject history bleed clot disorder Subject history cancer Subject unable refrain anticipates use prescription nonprescription medication Subject consume excessive amount alcohol caffeinated beverage daily
